ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Attn: Virus Warning ! ! !
ygData.msgSnippet: I aplogize for that, I got the virus from the cleric mailing list ironically and thought I hap wiped it off my system...  I was wrong, and a few emails got out
ygData.messageBody:
I aplogize for that, I got the virus from the cleric mailing list ironically
and thought I hap wiped it off my system... I was wrong, and a few emails
got out wit it before I caught it. Talies has already sent the info for
curing it...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Talies the Wanderer" <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2001 10:32 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Attn: Virus Warning ! ! !


> Although this probably reaches you too late, this is warning that "Matt
> DeBarger" <mattdeba@...> is infected with the "Badtrans" worm.
DO
> NOT OPEN ANY ATTACHMENTS FROM HIM!!!!
> His emails will appear to be replies to things you have sent the list, but
> will have an attachment that, when launched, will infect you with the
> virus. For more information on this virus, or cleaning instructions,
> should you already be infected, please visit
> http://vil.mcafee.com/dispVirus.asp?virus_k=99069
>
> As always, please keep a current version of virus-checking software on
your
> system at all times for maximum security.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> Assistant List-Admin
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
>
